resources.string:
==Orbital characteristics== **Distance from sun:** 1,433 million km (9.58 AU)
 **Eccentricity:** 0.0557
 **Orbital period:** 29.46 years
 **Average orbital speed :** 9.69 km/s
 **Inclination to ecliptic:** 2.49°
 **Satellites:** ~200 observed (61 with secure orbits)
==Physical characteristics== **Equatorial radius:** 60,268 km (9.45 Earths)
 **Flattening:** 0.0980
 **Volume:** 8.271×10^^14^^ km³ (764 Earths)
 **Mass:** 5.685×10^^26^^ kg (95.2 Earths)
 **Mean density:** 0.687 g/cm³ (less than water)
 **Equatorial surface gravity:** 10.44 m/s² (1.065 g)
 **Escape velocity:** 35.5 km/s
 **Sidereal rotation period:** 10h 34m
 **Equatorial rotation velocity:** 35,500 km/h
 **Axial tilt:** 26.73°
 **Bond albedo:** 0.342
 **Surface temp** (1 bar level)**:** 134K
==Atmosphere== **Scale height:** 59.5 km
 **Composition:**
 ~96% hydrogen (H,,2,,)
 ~3% helium
 ~0.4% methane
 ~0.01% ammonia
 ~0.01% hydrogen deuteride (HD)
 0.0007% ethane
 **Ices:**
 Ammonia, water, ammonium hydrosulfide(NH,,4,,SH)


Find out more on [[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Saturn|wikipedia]].
